node.title: Late Night Has Some Ideas on Who Set the Fox Christmas Tree Ablaze
node.alt: Jimmy Kimmel said that “even though lighting trees on fire is very much in line with Fox’s position on climate change, the hosts of their morning show were very upset today.”
node.description: “The fire is believed to have started after Fox News’ pants caught on fire,” Jimmy Kimmel said.
node.content: ["Welcome to Best of Late Night, a rundown of the previous night\u2019s highlights that lets you sleep \u2014 and lets us get paid to watch comedy. Here are the 50 best movies on Netflix right now.", "A 50-foot tree in front of Fox News\u2019s New York City headquarters was set on fire early Wednesday.", "\u201cThe fire is believed to have started after Fox News\u2019 pants caught on fire,\u201d Jimmy Kimmel joked.", "Samantha Bee got a tattoo to commemorate her 200th episode of \u201cFull Frontal.\u201d", "Michael B. Jordan will sit down with Stephen Colbert on Thursday\u2019s \u201cLate Night.\u201d", "The \u201cHacks\u201d star Meg Stalter loves Dolly Parton, Instagram Live and private karaoke."]
